entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 31 December 2022
